name: The Lone Astronaut
description:
This was our submission for the Global Game Jam 2018, with Tim Weightman officially joining the team and Luke Garside also joining for a few game jams.

The theme for this year was 'Transmission' so the game we developed was inspired by "The Martian" and had the player trapped on the planet Mars needing to complete many different puzzles in order to escape back home to earth.

LowPolyGames Team:

Daniel Dennis
